-- data Types and operators

```{r}
# implicite numeric declaration

delta = 8
class(delta)
```

L cast to integer

```{r}
delta = 8L
class(delta)
```

Other types

```{r}
logic = TRUE
logic = F
class(logic)
caracter = "Text"
caracter = 'Text'
class(caracter)
```

Math operations

```{r}
c = 2
d = 4
(c + d) * d
e = (c+d) *d
e
```

Logical tests

```{r}
a = 1
b = 2
a < b
a == b
```

Square root

```{r}
sqrt(540)
```
